title: Grinch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, you may attempt to steal the christmas spirit from another player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stealing the christmas spirit from another player will roleblock and blackmail them.
- You will also steal a charge of a limited use ability, if they have one, and you will be able to use it.

desc:
Post 4563
*You're a mean one, Mr. Grinch...*
